event_key.selectOptions:
{{(() => { const tableData = TableAlertRules.processedTableData || []; return tableData.length > 0 ? tableData.map((currentRow, currentIndex) => (
  (
    (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
      ? TableAlertRules.newRow.event_type
      : currentRow.event_type
    ) === "APPRO_SENT"
  )
    ? [
        { label: "Fonds", value: "FONDS" },
        { label: "Viroles", value: "VIROLES" },
        { label: "DVAI", value: "DVAI" },
        { label: "Visseries", value: "VISSERIES" },
        { label: "Joints", value: "JOINTS" },
        { label: "Autre", value: "AUTRE" },
        { label: "Brides", value: "BRIDES" }
      ]
  : (
      (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
        ? TableAlertRules.newRow.event_type
        : currentRow.event_type
      ) === "ACHATS_RECU"
    )
    ? [
        { label: "Brides", value: "BRIDES" },
        { label: "Visseries", value: "VISSERIES" }
      ]
  : (
      (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
        ? TableAlertRules.newRow.event_type
        : currentRow.event_type
      ) === "CONTROLE_FAIT"
    )
    ? [
        { label: "Visuels", value: "VISUELS" },

        { label: "Helium", value: "HELIUM" }
      ]
  : (
      (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
        ? TableAlertRules.newRow.event_type
        : currentRow.event_type
      ) === "PRESTA_COMMANDEE"
    )
    ? [
        { label: "Plateforme", value: "PLATEFORME" },
        { label: "Échelle", value: "ECHELLE" },
        { label: "Calorifuge", value: "CALORIFUGE" },
        { label: "Berces", value: "BERCES" },

        { label: "Agitation", value: "AGITATION" },
        { label: "Transport", value: "TRANSPORT" }
      ]
    : []
)) : 
  (
    (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
      ? TableAlertRules.newRow.event_type
      : currentRow.event_type
    ) === "APPRO_SENT"
  )
    ? [
        { label: "Fonds", value: "FONDS" },
        { label: "Viroles", value: "VIROLES" },
        { label: "DVAI", value: "DVAI" },
        { label: "Visseries", value: "VISSERIES" },

      ]
  : (
      (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
        ? TableAlertRules.newRow.event_type
        : currentRow.event_type
      ) === "ACHATS_RECU"
    )
    ? [
        { label: "Brides", value: "BRIDES" },
        { label: "Visseries", value: "VISSERIES" }
      ]
  : (
      (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
        ? TableAlertRules.newRow.event_type
        : currentRow.event_type
      ) === "CONTROLE_FAIT"
    )
    ? [
        { label: "Visuels", value: "VISUELS" },
        { label: "Radio", value: "RADIO" },
        { label: "FAT", value: "FAT" },
        { label: "Dimensionnels", value: "DIMENSIONNELS" },

        { label: "PMI", value: "PMI" },

  : (
      (TableAlertRules.isAddRowInProgress
